QuestData.Title: The Zan'thik Dig
QuestData.Description: We have just intercepted a message from an adjunct on Zan'vess. Yaungol laborers there have unearthed a paragon in the amber quarry on the back side of the island.$B$BGet there immediately and free him before the Zan'thik destroy him!
QuestData.LogDescription: Locate the unearthed paragon in the Amber Quarry on Zan'vess.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Locate the unearthed paragon in the Amber Quarry on Zan'vess.
QuestData.RewardText: <From the looks of it, this mantid was just recently broken out of his chamber. He lets out a hacking cough.>$B$B...Diss-ec...tor... has... returned...
